column5: A childhood friend finally sent me a message via email. He did say they were expecting when I last talked to him in person, I recieved the message today, they have a happy bouncing baby boy named Carson And I know for a fact that this boy will be a fisherman and a hunter, knowing his dad Congrats Buddy all the best The happiest news ive heard in weeks and I wanted to share it with everyone here
Well I'm happy for them too but they really should get that bouncing looked after.
